visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Sample Spline Chart'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include points from (-3, 3) to (3, 3). Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Sample Spline Chart'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x and y axes are styled with black lines and labeled with a font size of 12px and a color of #555. The data series includes points from (-3, 3) to (3, 3) with a custom color of #0073e6. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides and a light gray background color. The legend is enabled and styled with a font size of 14px and a dark gray color.
